snippet: He's a risk - perhaps even an enormous risk - but Peyton Manning brings a reward of "Super Bowl contention." For N.F.L. teams, that's the whole point.
abstract: He's a risk - perhaps even an enormous risk - but Peyton Manning brings a reward of "Super Bowl contention." For N.F.L. teams, that's the whole point.

headline.main: Weighing Risk and Reward on Peyton Manning
